statements: SELECT * FROM subscription_lists;
SELECT list_name, created_date FROM subscription_lists WHERE list_id = 1;
SELECT list_name, list_description FROM subscription_lists WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT list_id, list_name FROM subscription_lists ORDER BY list_name DESC;
SELECT list_id, list_name, created_date FROM subscription_lists WHERE list_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT list_name, list_description FROM subscription_lists WHERE list_id = 1;
SELECT list_name, created_date FROM subscription_lists WHERE list_name LIKE '%weekly%';
SELECT * FROM subscription_lists ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT list_id, list_name, list_description FROM subscription_lists WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT list_name, UPPER(list_description) AS uppercase_description FROM subscription_lists;
SELECT * FROM subscription_lists;
SELECT list_name, list_description FROM subscription_lists ORDER BY list_id DESC;
SELECT newsletter_id, subject, sent_date FROM newsletters WHERE list_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM newsletters WHERE subject LIKE '%important%';
SELECT list_id, COUNT(newsletter_id) AS total_newsletters FROM newsletters GROUP BY list_id HAVING total_newsletters > 2;
SELECT list_name, list_description FROM subscription_lists WHERE list_id = 1;
SELECT newsletter_id, subject, sent_date FROM newsletters WHERE list_id = 2 ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT list_name, list_description, COUNT(newsletter_id) AS total_newsletters FROM subscription_lists LEFT JOIN newsletters ON subscription_lists.list_id = newsletters.list_id GROUP BY list_name;

SELECT list_name, list_description, COUNT(newsletters.newsletter_id) AS total_newsletters FROM subscription_lists JOIN newsletters ON subscription_lists.list_id = newsletters.list_id GROUP BY list_name HAVING total_newsletters > 10;

SELECT list_id, list_name, COUNT(newsletter_id) AS total_newsletters FROM subscription_lists LEFT JOIN newsletters ON subscription_lists.list_id = newsletters.list_id GROUP BY list_id HAVING total_newsletters > 5 ORDER BY total_newsletters DESC;
SELECT * FROM newsletter_subscriptions;
SELECT subscription_id, email FROM newsletter_subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_id DESC;
SELECT email, subscription_date FROM newsletter_subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT content_id, content, send_date FROM newsletter_content ORDER BY send_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM newsletter_subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT email, customer_id FROM newsletter_subscriptions WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, segment_name FROM newsletter_content JOIN customer_segments ON newsletter_content.segment_id = customer_segments.segment_id;
SELECT DISTINCT segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE LENGTH(criteria) > 50;
SELECT * FROM newsletter_subscriptions WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM subscription_list;
SELECT list_name FROM subscription_list ORDER BY list_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT list_name FROM subscription_list WHERE list_id > 2;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT newsletter_id, subject FROM newsletter WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT list_name, COUNT(*) as total_subscriptions FROM subscription_list JOIN customer ON subscription_list.list_id = customer.customer_id GROUP BY list_name;
SELECT subject, content FROM newsletter WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT segment_name, criteria FROM segment WHERE segment_name LIKE '%VIP%' ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email, name FROM subscribers ORDER BY name;
SELECT subscriber_id, name, subscription_date FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT segment_name FROM segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT newsletter_id, title, sent_date FROM newsletters ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers
SELECT subscriber_id, email, name, subscription_date FROM subscribers
SELECT * FROM newsletters ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT newsletter_id, title, sent_date FROM newsletters WHERE sent_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'

SELECT s.name, n.title, n.sent_date FROM subscribers s INNER JOIN subscriber_segment ss ON s.subscriber_id = ss.subscriber_id INNER JOIN segment_newsletter sn ON ss.segment_id = sn.segment_id INNER JOIN newsletters n ON sn.newsletter_id = n.newsletter_id
